attachments.title: Open file via SSH and Sudo with Emacs
attachments.text: I want to open a file inside Emacs which is located on a remote server, with sudo powers on the server. I can open local files with sudo via Tramp like this: C-x C-f /sudo::/home/user/file But I ...
